resources.string:

string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: A functionality where written text is converted into spoken words. This feature could be useful for providing spoken explanations, translations, or additional context to complement the signed content.

A valuable tool for expressing written information into the dynamic and expressive medium of sign language gestures, it facilitates effective communication by allowing users to deliver written content into the vocabulary of sign language.

A functionality that enables users to input gestures in sign language, with the app subsequently translating these visual expressions into written text. This feature empowers users to convert signed content into a readable and accessible format.
